lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Glad you're comin' 'round. Found ya collapsed on the Peak so I brought ya back to the Fire Station here.
Right... you failed... You burrow a bit more deeply into the blanket he's holding you in.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: S'all right. Ain't nothin' t'fear. I gotcha...
He cradles you a little closer. You simply sit together for a while.
Eventually, you stir, trying to pop yourself slightly out of the blanket.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Feelin' ready t'stand on your own two feet again?

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Go on an' try, then. I'm here t'catch ya if ya fall.
He sets you down very gently. Your legs hold steady this time.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Doin' fine? Glad t'see it. I'm Zane, the Fire Chief, by the way.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Part o' my work is patrollin' the Peak t'help anyone in need.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Though I'd rather it was under different circumstances.

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Be more careful from now on, y'hear me?

lines.name: Zane
lines.text: Good. Anythin' else I can do for ya?
